sn9.11:3.1: 11. Akusalavitakkasutta
sn9.11:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ aññataro bhikkhu kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe.
sn9.11:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena so bhikkhu divāvihāragato pāpake akusale vitakke vitakketi, seyyathidaṃ—
sn9.11:4.4: Atha kho yā tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā tassa bhikkhuno anukampikā atthakāmā taṃ bhikkhuṃ saṃvejetukāmā yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami;
sn9.11:7.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu tāya devatāya saṃvejito saṃvegamāpādīti.
